import { Outlet, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useState } from "react"; // import useState hook export default function Layout() { const [isNavOpen, setIsNavOpen] = useState(false); // initiate isNavOpen state with false and name setter return (
{/* hide for desktop and laptop */}
setIsNavOpen((prev) => !prev)} // toggle isNavOpen state on click > {/* the actual hamburger lines*/} {/* the actual hamburger lines*/} {/* the actual hamburger lines*/}
{/* - toggle class based on isNavOpen state - plain CSS used here to simplify code */}
setIsNavOpen(false)} // change isNavOpen state to false to close the menu when X is clicked >
  • setIsNavOpen(false)}>Home
  • setIsNavOpen(false)}>One
  • setIsNavOpen(false)}>Two

); }
